generated_content.title: Paranormal Mysteries in Salem, Massachusetts - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the infamous sites of Salem's dark past, including the Salem Witch Trials and haunted locations like the House of the Seven Gables. Visit museums and tour historic sites to uncover the mysteries of this eerie town.
